/* SQL ID: www.api.isu.prj.prj.selectprjDetail Description : 상세조회 Query */ SELECT PRJ_ID ,GRP_CD ,PRJ_KEY ,PRJ_NM ,PRJ_DESC ,STATUS_CD ,COLOR_CD ,DATE_FORMAT(CREATED_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS CREATED_DT ,CREATED_BY ,DATE_FORMAT(UPDATED_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS UPDATED_DT ,UPDATED_BY ,USE_AT
FROM TB_PRJ WHERE PRJ_ID = #{prjId}
mapper.update:
/* SQL ID: www.api.isu.prj.prj.updateprj Description : 수정 Query */ UPDATE TB_PRJ
GRP_CD = #{grpCd},
PRJ_KEY = #{prjKey},
PRJ_NM = #{prjNm},
PRJ_DESC = #{prjDesc},
STATUS_CD = #{statusCd},
COLOR_CD = #{colorCd},
CREATED_DT = STR_TO_DATE(NULLIF(CONCAT(REPLACE(REPLACE(SUBSTRING_INDEX(REPLACE(#{createdDt}, 'T',' '), '.', 1),'Z',''),'T',' '), CASE WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(REPLACE(SUBSTRING_INDEX(REPLACE(#{createdDt}, 'T',' '), '.', 1),'Z',''),'T',' '))=16 THEN ':00' ELSE '' END),''), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'),
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy},
UPDATED_DT = STR_TO_DATE(NULLIF(CONCAT(REPLACE(REPLACE(SUBSTRING_INDEX(REPLACE(#{updatedDt}, 'T',' '), '.', 1),'Z',''),'T',' '), CASE WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(REPLACE(SUBSTRING_INDEX(REPLACE(#{updatedDt}, 'T',' '), '.', 1),'Z',''),'T',' '))=16 THEN ':00' ELSE '' END),''), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'),
UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy},
USE_AT = #{useAt},
WHERE PRJ_ID = #{prjId}
